answers.author: Robert Woods
answers.text:
You need to go to icmaRC.org - different corporate entities.

answers.author: Richard Brown
answers.text:
The RC web site probably has some of that information.  But the best bet is to contact your RC representative.  As I rememebr it, borrowing from your 401 0r 457 plan is not as easy as you might think.  Certain conditions have to be met for both the need to borrow and the terms of repayment.

author: Jeffrey Bailey
text: I have an ICMA 401k that I would like to borrow money from so I created an account @ ICMA.org and found nothing!
title: how do I borrow against my 401k
